svg.style: background: #ffffff; background-color: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); color-scheme: light dark;

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 498px; height: 1px; padding-top: 33px; margin-left: 69px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Arial; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: The Receptive Field Ceiling: CNN Context vs Biological Distances

switch.text: The Receptive Field Ceiling: CNN Context vs Biological Distances

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 398px; height: 1px; padding-top: 50px; margin-left: 119px;

div.div: Key: No amount of training data can teach a CNN to model dependencies beyond its receptive field — attention mechanisms are required

switch.text: Key: No amount of training data can teach a CNN to model dependencies beyond its receptive field — attention mechanisms...
